entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:01PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: Thunderstorms are beginning to develop across the Black Hills region. The storms will continue through the rest of the afternoon and into the evening. Small hail, gusty winds and brief heavy rain is possible with some of the stronger storms.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:55PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Sweetwater County through 245 PM MDT... At 154 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 43 miles east of Squaw Hollow Boat Ramp On Flaming Gorge, which is also 47 miles southeast of Rock Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail.
